ai-pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.1_0: Monks, both of them, the lustful nun, consents to a lustful man making physical contact with her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.2_0: Monks, both of them, the lustful nun, consented to a lustful man holding her hand and the edge of her offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.3_0: They may be expelled to the aggregates of offenses, with a serious offense in the shoulder of wrong conduct. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.1_0: curd that they have asked for, but there is a particular offense among the seven classes of offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.2_0: curd that they have asked for, and then eat in each monastery, he commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.3_0: They may be an offense entailing acknowledgment,
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.4:3.1_0: The fourth section of the Saṅgha is finished.
